channel.title: Code Cleanup
channel.description:
Ok, I know this is a HUGE request I'm putting out, but can someone please clean this code up. (hint: it is in my class 8 file for items, it is ugly and confusing) Heres the code: [url=http://pastebin.com/emUJvD5E]http://pastebin.com/emUJvD5E[/url] On pastebin because it was to big
I know I'm asking alot but i can't make any of this out. its such a scary code :eek: PLEASE SOMEONE clean this, I'm a bad coder and don't know what goes where

item.title: Code Cleanup
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:10, topic:393599”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=490769.msg3588688#msg3588688 date=1304389929]

http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/helios/SR2/eclipse-java-helios-SR2-win32-x86_64.zip&url=http://www.gtlib.gatech.edu/pub/eclipse/technology/epp/downloads/release/helios/SR2/eclipse-java-helios-SR2-win32-x86_64.zip&mirror_id=337

Eclipse Helios for 64-bit

Cool, Thanks, after i finish that. My next project will be a item list for every item off the client and to test if they all work on my server, and if some of them are duplicates or not. Im about 1/15 done with that, Lolz
[/quote]

You could just dump all the items from the cache/folder/class etc[/quote]
I honestly don’t know how to do that…

Read full topic

item.title: Code Cleanup
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

deathschaos9:

Yep, just threw it into eclipse.

Dam, i need to get eclipse, I have 2 more parts of the same file that are junkie like that.
The reason i had to do that is i lost my server (my last computers hard drive died ) and i gotta re-do everything and i’m using a new client. but im using the same source since i couldn’t find any good ones out there for 317 (i like the 317 feel, but 525 look) so i have to rebuild
Also, on eclipse.org what one do i download (64bit computer)

Read full topic

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:393599”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=490769.msg3588516#msg3588516 date=1304381745]

pastebin.com

http://pastebin.com/raw/QvY89sq5

		if (i == 2677) {
			class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
			class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
			class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5];
			class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5];
			class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280;
			class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503;
			class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183;
			class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200;
			class8.anIntArray160[0] = 923;
This paste has been truncated. show original

[/quote]
Holy crap, you actually did it, GREAT Job
Edit: Question: how long did it take?[/quote]

Probably not very long if you just plug the code into eclipse and have it clean/format.
